ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Mario Elgueta and Daniel Frías for allowing us to examine the insect collections from the Museo Nacional de Historia Natural (Santiago, Chile) and the Museo Entomológico de la Universidad Metropolitana de Ciencias de la Educación (UMCE, Chile), respectively. We also thank Francisca Peña, Emilio Paredes, Iván Wainnright and Nelson Adrian in charge of Zoonoses and Vector Sections (Regional Ministerial Secretary, SEREMI) of Región de Arica y Parinacota, Región de Tarapacá, Región de Valparaíso and Región de O’Higgins, respectively. We specially thank Patricio Arroyo and Universidad Católica del Maule-Chile for allowing us to use their computers, and Ricardo Campos for providing location data.
